title: Spanish green beans and tomatoes
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1kg fresh green beans, cut into 2.5cm lengths', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '3 tablespoons pinenuts', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 bay leaf', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
